text: I'm the only man on earth who doesn't know what his name is. Don't tell me. I want to preserve that distinction. I already know about Shepard and that Salvation Army chap Gagarin - the two biggest bores since Cardinal Newman. That's enough of all that hooey. HE plunges on into reminiscences of his trips. There is much to recall.
